title: Top SEO and Marketing Trends of 2017 (Plus a Look Ahead at 2018)
description: [The year 2017 brought many changes in the world of search engine optimization (SEO) and marketing. We review some of the most important trends of the past year that affect law firm marketing, and we also look forward to some of the changes we anticipate in the coming year. With rapid changes in areas such as HTTPS, structured data, accelerated mobile pages (AMP), and Google My Business, it is imperative that you or your marketing consultant stay abreast of marketing trends so that you don't fall behind your competitors.]
